cast.name: 卡恩.塔沙纳尔 Kaan Tasaner

introduction: Azam Kamber, a former police officer, formed a team with his close friend Pele to follow up on the cases of the wronged. After his painful experience, his mother in Trabzon wants him to marry his childhood friend Melike. Pele meddling as Azam tries to dodge the pressures. He sends the photo of Leyla, the eldest daughter of the Biçer family, Azam's new neighbors, to Şerife from Azam's phone with the note "The girl I love". Thereupon, the Kamber family took Melike with them and hurriedly came to Azam from Trabzon to Istanbul.On the other hand, Leyla and her family, whose photograph was taken, are a "strange" family. Leyla's family, apart from her father Tayfur, is a family with special abilities. Tayfur has no special talents, but he is someone who does risk analysis and pays attention to details. Mother Narin Biçer, Leyla's siblings Buğra and Berna are talented in different subjects. The murder of the eldest sons of the family by Safa Çağdaş leads the family to a revenge plan. However, they are faced with Çağdaş Varlı, a member of a YAPI that reaches everywhere.
